title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 104.3 - Removal of abandoned vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 104.3 - Removal of abandoned vehicles

State Regulations

Any abandoned vehicle shall be removed from the
right-of-way by an authorized garage or other agency designated by the Thruway

Authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
104.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
